name: Cake Maker Shop - Fast Food Restaurant Management
name_original: Cake Maker Shop - Fast Food Restaurant Management
description:
As a cake maker,now You have got a wonderful chance to open your own cake & cafe!

In this shop,you will sell tasty baked goods or coffee for customer.
Firstly the customer shows the menu that he or she wants, then according to customer needs to make the delicious cake or others and give it to them before they loose their patience.
Earn money to purchase more equipment and expand your cake shop business.

Try becoming a successful businessman in this fast-paced time management game!

Good Luck!
